item.description: Join us for a FREE course on Natural Health and Healing! Discussed will be the various stages of health and illness and how the wholeness of mind body and spirit leads to True Health. Learn to observe and evaluate your own behaviors and current lifestyle to identify factors that can be affecting your health. Discover Naturopathy, which seeks ways for the body to heal itself as well as proper breathing techniques, hydrotherapy, a balanced diet, just to name a few! We will also examine using the power of the mind for healing the body, showing the great power of belief in addition to exploring other natural treatments and activities such as herbal healing, yoga, massage, Tâ€™ai Chi, Feng Shui, natural remedies for emergencies and more! Take charge of your own health and healing and come Learn more with The HSCC!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Intro to Natural Health and Healing
